page.title: 01EDUCATION
page.content: Eastwood High School is a comprehensive .the role at present is approx. 1000 pupils and 80 staff .Adults are also able to enrol for courses of study . The school's main block consists of three floors which contain classrooms ,science and language laboratories and pratical rooms for home economics and business studies .It also contains the Library and Administration Offices .The school hall has a well equiped stage and behind it lies the Music Department and Dining Hall . Opposite the main entrance are two gymnasia and a swimming pool . Behind the main block lies the Art ,Technical and Biology Departments Sports and athletics are catered for in the adjacent sports field . Popular courses at present are business and computer studies .
